import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { OrderService } from '../service/order.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { constructor(private service:OrderService){} foodData:any; ngOnInit(): void { this.foodData = this.service.foodDetails; } } }
